label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_021
content:
## 2024-07-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 110
- Active: 96
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 51
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 14

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 35
- Standard: 37
- Placebo: 38

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.8
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 30.2
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.9
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 359.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 51.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 28.6
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.9
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 5.8
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.4
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 2.4
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.7

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 2.0
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 41.6
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.1
- Standard Six MWT (meters) Mean: 302.0
- Standard Six MWT (meters) SD: 52.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.4
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.5
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 0.8
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.6
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.3

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.4
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.0
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 8.4
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) Mean: 266.0
- Placebo Six MWT (meters) SD: 51.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.9
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.7
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.0
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.0
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.7

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 218
- Sessions Attended: 205
- Attendance Rate (%): 84.2

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2
- WBC (k) Mean: 7.4
- WBC (k) SD: 1.7
- Platelets (k) Mean: 234
- Platelets (k) SD: 41
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) Mean: 0.8
- Serum Creatinine (mg/dL) SD: 0.13
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) Mean: 107.0
- Blood Glucose (mg/dL) SD: 18.0
- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 19.0
- ESR (mm/hr) SD: 6.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2160, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2118, Description: sedation, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2105, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events
- Subject retention call completed for 20 overdue visits
- Central pharmacy opioid supply reconciliation completed

### Notes
- Week 21: Pain management assessments on track. 110 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
